    • nextMove

      void nextMove(Position firstPos, Position finalPos) throws IOException
      The method move a piece from a position to an another one.
      Parameters:
      firstPos - initial position
      finalPos - position where the piece want to move
      Throws:
      IOException - it can throw it when method try to store the game in database
